ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, Crip got his greaves a few weeks back on Veeshan. Sartori ... ________________________________________________________________________ Get Your
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, Crip<FoH> got his greaves a few weeks back on Veeshan.

Sartori


>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
>Date: Sat, 10 Jun 2000 17:36:22 -0400
>
>so far the only pieces found are gloves, boots, and legs. there is only
>one
>set of legs (on any server) because we were able to kill venril sathir
>before he was buffed incredibly (apparently he is a quest npc and not to be
>killed), and now his loot table is most likely empty. so we have gloves
>and
>boots. every other class with kunark armor has found one or all of the
>following, and this includes druid, ranger, shadow knight, paladin,
>warrior,
>rogue, shaman, cleric: arms, helm, bracer. none of these have been found
>in
>singing steel. i refuse to believe they have not been found yet. every
>other class with armor in kunark has found these pieces! maybe bards get
>lucky and our pieces are so incredible they are found only in veeshan's
>peak
>(laugh). so what i think is that once again, like imbrued armor in hate,
>bard armor has been forgotten to be placed in kunark. anyone who is more
>familiar and versed want to ask on the gameplay forum? or am i wrong?
>
>Shada Powa, L54 Wood Elf Minstrel (54.5)
>Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
